finance.name: company_name
finance.description: the full legal name of the company as disclosed in the annual report.

finance.name: registered_office
finance.description: the registered address or main office location of the company.

finance.name: exchange_code
finance.description: The code of the stock exchange where the company is listed (e.g., ASX, SUN).

finance.name: principal_activities
finance.description: main business activities or industry classification; choose one or more from ['Mining', 'finance', 'Healthcare', 'Manufacturing', 'Technology', 'Retail', 'Energy', 'Utilities', 'Real Estate', 'Transportation', 'Agriculture', 'Telecommunications', 'Media', 'Other'], seperated by `||` (e.g. Mining || finance).

finance.name: board_members
finance.description: profiles of board members.

finance.name: executive_profiles
finance.description: profiles of executive management team members.

finance.name: revenue
finance.description: total operating revenue recognized during the reporting period. Enter a number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: net_profit_or_loss
finance.description: net profit or loss amount for the reporting period (enter a negative number for loss). Enter a number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: total_Debt
finance.description: total debt outstanding at the end of the reporting period. Enter a number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: total_assets
finance.description: total assets held by the company at the end of the reporting period. Enter a number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: cash_reserves
finance.description: total cash and cash equivalents held at period-end. Enter a number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: net_assets
finance.description: net asset value at the end of the reporting period. Enter a number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: earnings_per_share
finance.description: earnings per share (EPS) for the reporting period. Enter a number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: dividend_per_share
finance.description: dividends paid per share for the period. Enter a number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: largest_shareholder
finance.description: the name of the largest shareholder.

finance.name: the_highest_ownership_stake
finance.description: the highest percentage of ownership held by a single shareholder. Enter a number, unit: percent (%).

finance.name: major_equity_changes
finance.description: whether there were major equity changes during the period; choose one from ['Yes', 'No'].

finance.name: major_events
finance.description: type(s) of major events; choose one or more from ['M&A', 'Litigation', 'Major Contract', 'Leadership Change', 'Restructuring', 'Delisting', 'Other'], seperated by `||` (e.g. Litigation).

finance.name: bussiness_sales
finance.description: total operating revenue from all major business lines or segments. If the document reports revenue for multiple segments separately, sum all segments to obtain the total. Enter a single number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: bussiness_profit
finance.description: total profit contributed by all major business lines or projects. If the document reports profit for multiple segments separately, sum all segments to obtain the total. Enter a single number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: bussiness_cost
finance.description: total cost associated with all main business lines or projects. If the document reports cost for multiple segments separately, sum all segments to obtain the total. Enter a single number. If the original currency is not USD, convert to USD according to the latest available exchange rate.

finance.name: business_segments_num
finance.description: number of business segments reported. Enter a number.

finance.name: business_risks
finance.description: main types of business risks; choose one or more from ['Market Risk', 'Credit Risk', 'Operational Risk', 'Legal/Compliance Risk', 'Environmental Risk', 'Strategic Risk', 'Other'], seperated by `||` (e.g. Credit Risk || Market Risk).

finance.name: remuneration_policy
finance.description: executive remuneration policy type; choose only one from ['Fixed', 'Performance-based', 'Stock Option', 'Mixed', 'Not Disclosed'].

finance.name: auditor
finance.description: name of the external audit firm.
